content: कालिंग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (गी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कलिंग-अण्] {@--1@} Produced in, or belonging to, the Kaliṅga country. --गः {1} A king of that country; प्रतिजग्राह कालिंगस्तमस्त्रैर्गजसाधनः <ls>R. 4. 40.</ls> {@--2@} A snake of that country. {@--3@} An elephant. {@--4@} A species of cucumber. {@--5@} A poisonous plant. {@--6@} A sort of iron. --गाः (<ab>pl.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of a country; see कलिंग. --गं A water-melon.
